environmentalDataLogging.controllers

Class SampleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • environmentalDataLogging.controllers.SampleController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/Api/Sample")
public class SampleController
extends java.lang.Object
    Restful controller class to direct input for sample related actions. Capable of handling cases of: Deleting sample by id Updating sample information Getting sample by id Creating a new sample Getting all samples
